{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Actiontec |model=MI424WR |revision=GigE |upc=0789286807663 |fcc_date=02/03/2010 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf_model=MC524WR |type=wireless router, FiOS modem |fcc_id=LNQMI424WRG |pwr_v=10 |pwr_amp=1.6 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Cavium |cpu1_model=CN5020 |cpu1_cspeed=500 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=64 |fla1_brand=Intel |fla1_model=JS28F512M29EWH |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4T1G164QF-BCE6 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag=yes,, 14-pin header,, unpopulated,, J2 |serial=yes,, 3.3V TTL,, 6-pin header,, populated,, (115200,8,N,1),, J7 |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9227 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM53115 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=8-Kb I2C CMOS Serial EEPROM;Catalyst Semiconductor;24C08WI;;1;,,, USB 2.0 HUB Controller; Genesys Logic;GL850G;;1;,,, 4-PLL Clock Generator with SSC;Silicon Labs;SL38000-15AH;;1;,,, MoCA 1.1 controller;Entropic Communications;EN2510-NG1;;2;,,, |flags=MoCA 1.1 |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.1;;, |stock_os=Linux;2.6.16.14;OpenRG;, |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=Actiontec, |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |oui=00:26:62,00:26:B8,00:1F:90 |oui_eth=00:26:62,00:26:B8,00:1F:90 }} '''Wireless Verizon FiOS Router with Gigabit Ethernet (GigE)''' [https://www.actiontec.com/214.html Product page] *[http://www.dslreports.com/forum/r26826672- Appears to also be Cavium based] :CPU: [[Cavium]] Networks Octeon CN50XX V0.1 :wifi0: Atheros AR9287 (AR9227 - PCI) :switch: Broadcom BCM53xx *[http://www.dslreports.com/forum/r26866489-Actiontec-MI424WR-Rev-G-Firmware 00:26:B8 OUI assumed, picture of the label] :Wireless chip may be AR9227 The default SSID may be ''Actiontec''. The default login password is prompted on 1st use. ===Serial=== ====cpuinfo====
